title: Can a narcissist actually bond with you over a shared interest and miss that bond in your absence? - Quora

response.answer_text: The ONLY bond they are interested in…is a TRAUMA BOND… with YOU as the victim… in your absence… the only thing they miss…is CONTROLLING YOU…and YOUR SUPPLY OF ATTENTION…. it is NEVER about you….they have SEVERAL OTHERS that they are using to get their supply…. LET THEM….and BE ABSENT… HEAL from your trauma… BE GLAD you are no longer in their clutches….go out and SHINE!!!!

No. Anything the narcissist tells you is self-serving if not exaggerations or outright fabrications. The narcissist is incapable of bonding with other human beings in a loving way. Narcissists do have a long woe is me feel sorry for me stories to hook targets into feeling sorry for them. The goal is to exploit the targets for everything they are worth.
